The Palate Deck

Playing cards that offer beer information and casual tasting guidance for the many conversations that happen over beer.

Role: Creator

The Story

The Palate Deck is a set of Tasting Cards that encourage conversation and gameplay while sampling beer. You and up to 3 other people collaboratively select the cards that best describe what you’re tasting. Many different play styles are supported for beginners and experience tasters alike.

It’s more than just playing cards though, it’s an in-depth tasting guide that provides similar flavors to help pinpoint a specific taste. It even lists some of the reasons why you’re experiencing a given flavor or sensation in a beer. Using the Palate Deck will help you improve your tasting perception and overall appreciation for the beer you’re drinking — any beer!

The Kickstarter funding campaign is currently running. If you’re into beer, go check it out!
